name: Normandylp.GitHub.io
body:
![Android Lollipop](http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zZ1iCaBd2XU/VD4MaIQ1wMI/AAAAAAAAPfQ/t0J7eveSy1Y/s1600/Lollipop%2BForest.jpg)
**# Welcome to Normandy LP Team website**

**## How to Build a Rom ?**

_### 1. Download Device tree of Nokia x (Normandy) by writing this code_

`git clone https://github.com/NormandyLP/android_device_nokia_normandy.git device/nokia/normandy`

_### 2. Download Vendor files by writing this code _

`git clone https://github.com/NormandyLP/android_vendor_nokia_normandy.git vendor/nokia/normandy`

_### 3. Download Lulz kernel by writing this code_

`git clone https://github.com/NormandyLP/normandy_lulz_kernel.git kernel/nokia/normandy`

_### 4. Download needed packages_

`git clone https://github.com/NormandyLP/hardware_qcom_media.git hardware/qcom/media-caf/msm7x27a`

`git clone https://github.com/NormandyLP/hardware_qcom_media.git hardware/qcom/media-caf/msm7x27a`

_### 5. Apply Patches in the device/nokia/normandy/patches_

`cd device/nokia/normandy/patches`
`sh apply.sh`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
